video_title: Dont be motivated be driven, Do you agree? #growth #mindset #positivity #adviceoftheday
transcript:
motivation sucks stop trying to be
motivated I don't want I don't I
literally don't want you to be motivated
anymore motivation is
fleeting sometimes it's here sometimes
it's not here what you want is you want
to be driven you want to be consistent
motivation is like a spark but being
driven is like that big log that you put
on a campfire that burns for hours if
you're searching for motivation every
single morning you've already lost the
battle you want to wake up every single
morning and be driven not motivated cuz
you can see in a driven person's eyes
can't you nothing is going to stop them
so then how do you become more driven
towards something what you have to have
is a strong why why are you working
towards that goal something that's
important that is outside of you your
children your community your family your
wife because when your why is strong
enough the how to get off your butt and
get it done becomes so much easier
